basics.name: Mian Muhammad
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: A Programming Enthusiast and a Full-Stack JavaScript developer proficient in modern single-page applications and secure, scalable back-ends using React, GraphQL, REST, NodeJS and the cloud.

work.name: Maxenius
work.summary: Design, Develope and Manage softwares using ExpressJS, NestJS and ReactJS.

details.text: Working with the client to convert technical requirements into Frontend or backend code.
Contributed to Digsmore(Its just like CarFax) and lead the backend team of project. Also contributed to frontend.
Developed and maintaining a ReactJS/NodeJS App for shopify.
Writing tests using JEST and Cypress.

work.summary: Structure and design custom REST APIs built in JavaScript Nodejs/Express.

details.text: Participated in all phases of software development life cycle (SDLC).

Collaborated with other software engineers in diagnosing, fixing, and preventing production issues.Work with the technical lead and other engineers to maintain and develop new features, as well as enhancing existing functionalities.
Jira task creation and task assignment to team members. Projects worked on Ticketlake, Brandcloud, Bob the Builder

work.name: Synavos

projects.name: Meymaar
projects.description: Meymaar is an end-to-end solution based on BIM for companies dealing with Construction services. It provides workflow from very concept of a building to 3D modeling (Integrated with Autodesk Revit) , building cost estimates, budget approvals, bidding, tendering, contracting leading up to Construction & Tracking of a building. I was involved in development of Backend APIs, bugs fixes.

projects.name: Ticketlake
projects.description: This Project is basically a SaaS-based multi-platform ticketing System. In which one company can register with ticketlake and can sell their tickets and for consumer-end, there is a web and mobile apps where they can buy tickets. This platform is providing an ecosystem to whole ticketing-related things.

projects.name: FEBYS
projects.description: It is an multi vendor e-commerce website like amazon. It has an admin panel, website for consumer, an android and iOS application. I was involved in development and maintenance of backend APIs

projects.name: Brandcloud
projects.description: BrandCloud’s Social DNA™ uses interactions with millions of consumers to identify a brand’s most active customers and develop behavioral profiles that outline what motivates them to purchase and advocate for the brand. I am fully responsible for writing and maintaining the entire backend of this project
